verses.name: John 9:6
verses.text: When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,

verses.name: John 9:7
verses.text: And said unto him, Go, wash in the pool of Siloam, (which is by interpretation, Sent.) He went his way therefore, and washed, and came seeing.

verses.name: John 9:8
verses.text: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?

verses.name: John 9:9
verses.text: Some said, This is he: others said, He is like him: but he said, I am he.
